spiderman.title: Spider-man landing page
spiderman.description: Landing page developed during frontweek, using the Spider-Man: Miles Morales release as a theme. It demonstrates how we can use JavaScript to orchestrate animations and the use of variables in SCSS to expedite the development of styles.

jsonapi.title: Locations (JSON-API)
jsonapi.description: A proof of concept developed with the aim of demonstrating the use of the JSON-API library, enabling the creation of a local API using a JSON file as data storage. Very useful in projects or features that depend on collaboration with backend teams.
